snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes how blind people are using iPhones and a discussion of how Zynga's purchase of Omgpop, the maker of the game...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes how blind people are using iPhones and a discussion of how Zynga's purchase of Omgpop, the maker of the game Draw Something, is looking a month later.
